title: Grand Theft Audo IV
description:
How ti install:
- Download deamon tools or MagicISO (if you don't have either of it)
- Mount disc 1
- Open the files (if it doesn't autorun) and double click on setup.exe
- After a while it asks for disc 2
- Click unmount disc and mount disc 2 like you did before.
- After that it asks for disc 1, do the same like you did above here.
- Next when it's installed open the folder with the crack files.
- Put them into the GTA IV folder and launch your GTA IV with the:
GTAIVLauncher.exe and your done! 

System Requirements
CPU: 	Intel Core 2 Quad 2,4 GHz, AMD Phenom X3 2,1 GHz
RAM: 	2,5 GB Windows XP 2.5 GB Windows Vista
VGA: 	512 MB NVIDIA 8600 / 512 MB ATI 3870
OS: 	Windows Vista - Service Pack 1 / XP - Service Pack 3
HDD: 	18 GB
Sound: 	DirectX Compatible
ODD: 	DVD-ROM

Source uploader: niels875
